page.title: 11FARMING
page.content: There are 8 main farms in our block: HILL FARM:main crops-spring barley (feed),winter barley(seed),peas(Map- kana),ryegrass,fodder beet(Monerosa, Hugin,Vermon,Trestel),sugarbeet(Primo for Silver Spoon sugar),grass(sileage) also grass paddock area(sheep&cattle). Small pond in conservation area.LOWER WESTON:sugarbeet,mowing grass,spring barley & grazing(sheep&cattle). PORCH FARM:(12fields)cereal crop & winter barley,oil seed rape,haycrop,potatoes, grazing & meadow(cattle).RYEFORD FARM: (5fields-46acres) ryegrass(seed crop), barley(animal feed),potatoes. HILDERS- LEY:(61acres) spring & winter barley, hay,grass(sileage),grazing(cattle&shee p).WOODFIELDS:(68 acres) fruit farm - apples & pears. ECCLESWALL COURT:(60 acres)ryegrass & barley(seedcrop) for grazing & animal feed.BOLLITREE CASTLE permanent grass,oilseed rape,w.barley.
